description: Improve session communication.json real-time synchronization - update agent statuses, CSV metrics, and aggregation data automatically as phases complete instead of manual orchestrator edits. Enable orchestrator to read agent outputs and sync back to master tracking.

identified_issues: Agent status fields remain 'not_started' after Phase 1 completion
CSV metrics (total_resources, resource_types) not updated after Phase 2
Aggregation data frozen at Phase 1 counts
Orchestrator updates phase-level tracking but not agent-level or metrics
context.root_cause: Read-only orchestrator pattern - agents execute autonomously, orchestrator synthesizes but doesn't sync findings back to master communication.json
context.proposed_solution: Add orchestrator sync workflow: after each phase completion, read agent outputs, extract metrics, update communication.json with actual state

target_improvements: Auto-update agent status when phase completes
Auto-refresh CSV metrics from actual CSV file
Auto-update aggregation counts based on current phase
Add validation: communication.json vs ground truth
